verses.verse: <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said:<s%> "Gather yourselves <S%H622>together,<s%> that I may <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that which will <S%H7122>happen<s%> to you in the <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H319>come.<s%>
<S%H6908>Assemble<s%> <S%H8085>yourselves,<s%> and hear, you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

<S%H7205>"Reuben,<s%> you are my <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> my <S%H3581>might,<s%> and the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of my <S%H202>strength;<s%> <S%H3499>excelling<s%> in <S%H7613>dignity,<s%> and <S%H3499>excelling<s%> in <S%H5794>power.<s%>

Boiling over as <S%H4325>water,<s%> you shall not <S%H3498>excel;<s%> because <S%H2490>you<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2490>your<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4904>bed,<s%> then defiled <S%H5927>it.<s%> He went up to my <S%H3326>couch.<s%>
<S%H8095>"Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> are <S%H251>brothers.<s%> Their <S%H4380>swords<s%> are <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H935>don't<s%> come into their <S%H5475>council.<s%> My <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H3161>don't<s%> be united to their <S%H6951>assembly;<s%> for in their <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%> In their <S%H7522>self-will<s%> they <S%H6131>hamstrung<s%> <S%H7794>cattle.<s%>

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be their <S%H639>anger,<s%> for it was <S%H5794>fierce;<s%> and their <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> for it was <S%H7185>cruel.<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> them in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3063>"Judah,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3027>you.<s%> Your hand will be on the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> will bow down before <S%H7812>you.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> is a <S%H738>lion<s%>'s <S%H1482>cub.<s%> From the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> you have gone <S%H5927>up.<s%> He stooped <S%H3766>down,<s%> he <S%H7257>crouched<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> as a <S%H3833>lioness.<s%> Who will rouse him <S%H6965>up?<s%>

The <S%H7626>scepter<s%> will not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> nor the <S%H2710>ruler<s%>'s staff from between his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H3588>until<s%> <S%H7886>he<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to whom it <S%H3349>belongs.<s%> To him will the obedience of the peoples <S%H5971>be.<s%>

<S%H631>Binding<s%> his <S%H5895>foal<s%> to the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> his <S%H860>donkey<s%>'s <S%H1121>colt<s%> to the choice <S%H8321>vine;<s%> he has <S%H3526>washed<s%> his <S%H3830>garments<s%> in <S%H3196>wine,<s%> his <S%H5497>robes<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will be <S%H2447>red<s%> with <S%H3196>wine,<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> with <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

<S%H2074>"Zebulun<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> He will be for a <S%H2348>haven<s%> of <S%H591>ships.<s%> His <S%H3411>border<s%> will be on <S%H6721>Sidon.<s%>
<S%H3485>"Issachar<s%> is a <S%H1634>strong<s%> <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> lying <S%H7257>down<s%> between the <S%H4942>saddlebags.<s%>

He <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H2896>place,<s%> that it was good, the <S%H776>land,<s%> that it was <S%H5276>pleasant.<s%> He <S%H5186>bows<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to the <S%H5445>burden,<s%> and becomes a <S%H5647>servant<s%> doing forced <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
<S%H1835>"Dan<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H1835>Dan<s%> will be a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> an <S%H8207>adder<s%> in the <S%H734>path,<s%> That <S%H5391>bites<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%>'s <S%H6119>heels,<s%> so that his <S%H7392>rider<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>
I have waited <S%H6960>for<s%> your <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
"A <S%H1416>troop<s%> will <S%H1464>press<s%> on <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> but he will <S%H1464>press<s%> on their <S%H6119>heel.<s%>
<S%H836>"Asher<s%>'s <S%H3899>food<s%> will be <S%H8082>rich.<s%> He will <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H4574>dainties.<s%>
<S%H5321>"Naphtali<s%> is a <S%H355>doe<s%> set <S%H7971>free,<s%> who <S%H5414>bears<s%> <S%H8233>beautiful<s%> <S%H561>fawns.<s%>

<S%H3130>"Joseph<s%> is a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>vine,<s%> a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>vine<s%> by a <S%H5869>spring.<s%> His <S%H1323>branches<s%> <S%H6805>run<s%> over the <S%H7791>wall.<s%>
The <S%H1167>archers<s%> have severely grieved <S%H4843>him,<s%> <S%H7232>shot<s%> at <S%H7852>him,<s%> and persecute him:

But his <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H386>strong.<s%> The <S%H2220>arms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were made <S%H6339>strong,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> (from there is the <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>),

even by the <S%H410>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> who will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H854>you;<s%> by the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> who will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1293>you,<s%> with blessings of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5920>above,<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that lies <S%H7257>below,<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H7699>breasts,<s%> and of the <S%H7356>womb.<s%>

The <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> have <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> above the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of your <S%H2029>ancestors,<s%> above the <S%H8379>boundaries<s%> of the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1389>hills.<s%> They will be on the <S%H6936>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> on the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him who is <S%H5139>separated<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H1144>"Benjamin<s%> is a <S%H2963>ravenous<s%> <S%H2061>wolf.<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he will <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H5706>prey.<s%> At <S%H6153>evening<s%> he will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>"

All these are the <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and this is what their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H1288>them.<s%> He blessed <S%H834>everyone<s%> <S%H376>according<s%> to his <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

He <S%H6680>instructed<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> and said to <S%H622>them,<s%> "I am to be gathered to my <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H6912>Bury<s%> me with my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%>

in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field<s%> from <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> as a <S%H272>burial<s%> <S%H6913>place.<s%>

There they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%> There they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and there I <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3812>Leah:<s%>
the <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is <S%H4735>therein,<s%> which was purchased from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>"

When <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6680>charging<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> he gathered <S%H622>up<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> into the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and yielded up the <S%H1478>spirit,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
